languages.text: {n}Янрис кладет руку на грудь, где была страшная рана.{/n} "Хирургеоны несколько часов боролись за мою жизнь, и, должен сказать, они не зря получают жалование! Обещали, что останется героического вида шрам — хотя, признаться, я больше предпочитаю мозоли от автопера".

{n}Janris puts a hand on his chest, right where the gruesome wound used to be.{/n} "The chirurgeons spent hours fighting for my life, and I have to say, they are earning their keep! They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although, admittedly, I much prefer calluses from an autoquill."
languages.original_text: {n}Янрис кладет руку на грудь, где была страшная рана.{/n} "Хирургеоны несколько часов боролись за мою жизнь, и, должен сказать, они не зря получают жалование! Обещали, что останется героического вида шрам — хотя, признаться, я больше предпочитаю мозоли от автопера".

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris puts a hand on his chest, right where the gruesome wound used to be.{/n} "The chirurgeons spent hours fighting for my life, and I have to say, they are earning their keep! They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although admittedly I prefer blisters from an auto quill more than anything else."

They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although admittedly I prefer blisters from an auto quill more than anything else."

They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although admittedly I prefer blisters from an auto quill more than anything else."

They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although admittedly I prefer blisters from an auto quill more than anything else."

{n}Janris puts a hand on his chest, right where the gruesome wound used to be.{/n} "The chirurgeons spent hours fighting for my life, and I have to say, they are earning their keep! They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although, admittedly, I much prefer calluses from an autoquill."

{n}Janris puts a hand on his chest, right where the gruesome wound used to be.{/n} "The chirurgeons spent hours fighting for my life, and I have to say, they are earning their keep! They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although, admittedly, I much prefer calluses from an autoquill."

languages.text: {n}Janris legt eine Hand auf seine Brust, genau an die Stelle, wo die schreckliche Wunde war.{/n} "Die Chirurgeums haben stundenlang um mein Leben gekämpft, und ich muss sagen, sie sind ihr Geld wert. Sie haben mir eine heldenhaft aussehende Narbe versprochen, obwohl ich eigentlich Hornhaut durch eine Autofeder bevorzuge."
languages.original_text: {n}Janris puts a hand on his chest, right where the gruesome wound used to be.{/n} "The chirurgeons spent hours fighting for my life, and I have to say, they are earning their keep! They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although, admittedly, I much prefer calluses from an autoquill."

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris legt eine Hand auf seine Brust, genau an die Stelle, wo die schreckliche Wunde war.{/n} "Die Chirurgeums haben stundenlang um mein Leben gekämpft, und ich muss sagen, sie sind ihr Geld wert. Sie haben mir eine heldenhaft aussehende Narbe versprochen, obwohl ich eigentlich Hornhaut durch eine Autofeder bevorzuge."

languages.text: {n}Janris se lleva una mano al pecho, donde había sufrido su espantosa herida.{/n} «Los cirujanos se pasaron horas luchando por mantenerme con vida, ¡y debo decir que se han ganado el sueldo! Han prometido dejarme una cicatriz heroica, aunque, la verdad, prefiero con diferencia los callos de las plumas automáticas».
languages.original_text: {n}Janris puts a hand on his chest, right where the gruesome wound used to be.{/n} "The chirurgeons spent hours fighting for my life, and I have to say, they are earning their keep! They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although, admittedly, I much prefer calluses from an autoquill."

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris se lleva una mano al pecho, donde había sufrido su espantosa herida.{/n} «Los cirujanos se pasaron horas luchando por mantenerme con vida, ¡y debo decir que se han ganado el sueldo! Han prometido dejarme una cicatriz heroica, aunque, la verdad, prefiero con diferencia los callos de las plumas automáticas».

languages.text: {n}ジャンリスは自分の胸に手を置く。そう、かつてひどい傷があったその場所に。{/n}「チラ－ジョンはこの命のために、何時間も奮闘してくれました。あの腕で食べているのは確実でしょう！彼らは英雄らしく傷跡を残してくれると約束してくれたのです。正直言うと、オートクイルによるアザの方が好ましいですが」
languages.original_text: {n}Janris puts a hand on his chest, right where the gruesome wound used to be.{/n} "The chirurgeons spent hours fighting for my life, and I have to say, they are earning their keep! They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although, admittedly, I much prefer calluses from an autoquill."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジャンリスは自分の胸に手を置く。そう、かつてひどい傷があったその場所に。{/n}「チラ－ジョンはこの命のために、何時間も奮闘してくれました。これは言えます、あの腕で食べているのは確実です！彼らは英雄らしく傷跡を残してくれると約束してくれたのですが、正直言うと、オートクイルによるアザの方が好ましいです」

languages.text: {n}詹里斯将一只手放在胸口上，那里曾经是鲜血淋漓的伤口。{/n}“船医花了好几个小时才把我抢救了回来。我不得不说，这些人确实对得起他们的工资！他们保证说只会留下充满英雄气概的疤痕，但老实说，我更喜欢自动羽毛笔留下的老茧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Janris puts a hand on his chest, right where the gruesome wound used to be.{/n} "The chirurgeons spent hours fighting for my life, and I have to say, they are earning their keep! They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although, admittedly, I much prefer calluses from an autoquill."

traits.locale_text: {n}詹里斯将一只手放在胸口上，那里曾经是鲜血淋漓的伤口。{/n}“船医花了好几个小时才把我抢救了回来。我不得不说，这些人确实对得起他们的工资！他们保证说只会留下充满英雄气概的疤痕，但老实说，我更喜欢自动羽毛笔留下的老茧。”

languages.text: {n}Janris pose une main sur sa poitrine, à l'endroit précis où il a été grièvement blessé.{/n} « Les chirurgeons ont trimé des heures durant pour me sauver la vie, et je dois dire qu'ils méritent largement leur solde ! Ils m'ont promis que j'en garderais une cicatrice digne d'un héros... même s'il faut bien avouer que je préfère de loin les callosités laissées par les autoplumes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Janris puts a hand on his chest, right where the gruesome wound used to be.{/n} "The chirurgeons spent hours fighting for my life, and I have to say, they are earning their keep! They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although, admittedly, I much prefer calluses from an autoquill."

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris pose une main sur sa poitrine, à l'endroit précis où il a été grièvement blessé.{/n} « Les chirurgeons ont trimé des heures durant pour me sauver la vie, et je dois dire qu'ils méritent largement leur solde ! Ils m'ont promis que j'en garderais une cicatrice digne d'un héros... même s'il faut bien avouer que je préfère de loin les callosités laissées par les autoplumes. »

languages.text: {n}Janris, bir elini göğsündeki korkunç yarasının bulunduğu yere koyuyor.{/n} "Cerrah, canımı kurtarmak için saatlerce mücadele etti. Nasıl geçimini sağlayacağını bildiğini de eklemem gerek! Kahramanlara layık bir yara izi bırakacağını vadetti. Gerçi itiraf edeyim, yara izine kıyasla otoyazar nasırlarını yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: {n}Janris puts a hand on his chest, right where the gruesome wound used to be.{/n} "The chirurgeons spent hours fighting for my life, and I have to say, they are earning their keep! They promised to leave a heroic-looking scar, although, admittedly, I much prefer calluses from an autoquill."
